text: 3:25 Meihou 22:18 Maichousinggi mapanna Tengban Mapuna pibikhiba wasaksing adu nakhoigini aduga Tengban Mapuna nakhoigi napa napusingga walepnakhiba aduda nakhoigi saruk yao-i. Ibungo mahakna Abraham-da haibikhiba, ‘Nahakki charol-surolgi mapanna malemda leiba mioi kanglup pumnamak yaipha thoujal phangjagani.’
